title: Punjab Minister Advocates for AI Technology to Boost Prison Security | Chandigarh News - Times of India
text: Chandigarh: Punjab jails minister Laljit Singh Bhullar has emphasised on the implementation of AI-based and ultra-modern tech to strengthen security measures across the prisons in the state.Chairing his maiden meeting with senior officials of the jail department and all jail superintendents, he asserted that adopting cutting-edge tech is crucial for making prisons crime-free and preventing the use of mobile devices and other prohibited items. Bhullar ordered officials to expedite the installation of advanced surveillance systems.The prisons minister also said that he would meet chief minister Bhagwant Mann to discuss funding allocation for the jails department to ensure adequate resources for modernisation initiatives and essential amenities. New jails and additional barracks would be constructed across the state to decongest prisons, he said. Bhullar instructed officials to implement stringent security measures to make prisons completely crime-free.The cabinet minister also said that prisoners should make various products to achieve financial self-sufficiency.
